GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE CAN_ATTACK CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS SALVAGER PRELOAD SCORE ATTACK_NEEDS_LINE_OF_SIGHT GARRISONABLE_UNTIL_DESTROYED LARGE_RECTANGLE_PATHFIND VEHICLE CAN_SHOOT_OVER_WALLS UNIQUE_UNIT CAN_BE_FAVORITE_UNIT METAUNIT USE_STRICT_PATHING

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev == "STATE_Selected" or Prev == "ATNB" or Prev == "STATE_moving" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") end;
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_built" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_built") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev == "STATE_bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end;
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev == "STATE_bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end;

InvisibilityNugget.ForbiddenConditions: PREATTACK_A FIRING_A FIRING_OR_PREATTACK_A RELOADING_A PREATTACK_B FIRING_B FIRING_OR_PREATTACK_B RELOADING_B PREATTACK_C FIRING_C FIRING_OR_PREATTACK_C RELOADING_C USING_WEAPON_A USING_WEAPON_B USING_WEAPON_C
